0110000011110001 1011010110111001 0 -> sum: 0001011010101010, cout: 1
1010110111000000 1101100110100100 0 -> sum: 1000011101100100, cout: 1
1000000100111101 0010101100011000 1 -> sum: 1010110001010110, cout: 0
0000010111100011 0101001111001001 1 -> sum: 0101100110101101, cout: 0
0010010001111111 0000000111111110 1 -> sum: 0010011001111110, cout: 0
0110011111011111 0011100101011000 1 -> sum: 1010000100111000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
